DOC.brief_title: Vulvar Mucosal Specialty Clinic Chart Review
DOC.detailed_description: Vulvar disorder common , frequency importance often under-recognized . The spectrum vulvar disease vast include congenital malformation , inflammatory mucocutaneous disease , blister erosive disease , benign malignant tumor , autoimmune disorder , infectious disease , various idiopathic condition . Evaluation management genital complaint dermatoses complicated frequent multifactorial nature vulvar symptom variable clinical expression disease vulva . In many case , empiric treatment institute absence definitive diagnosis . Of note , expertise diagnosis management vulvar disorder often lack part gynecology , dermatology primary care physician . The investigator seek analyze data patient population Northwestern Memorial Hospital ( NMH ) outpatient clinic Northwestern Memorial Faculty Foundation ( NMFF ) good define clinical spectrum vulvar disease . The investigator also assess approach diagnosis management patient vulvar disease attention give clinical outcome impact quality life . This information help investigator well understand scope care patient currently receive , identify deficit current practice , advance potential new standard care .
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 year age old Patients see Northwestern Medical Group Department Dermatology see Dr. Bethanee Schlosser and/or member Vulvar Mucosal Specialty Clinic team respective clinic setting . Patients refuse complete mucocutaneous examination . Patients refuse recommend diagnostic procedure . Pregnant woman prisoner .
